channel.title: Comments on: PIC16F628 Serial 8 RGB LED PWM Controller
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Uttam Dutta

item.description: Can you please provide video for 8 RGB LED project, and expecting a RGB LED CUBE project and its details. regards, Uttam Dutta/India

item.title: By: Sputnik
item.dc:creator: Sputnik
item.description: How about making it where it stores the pattern in EEPROM and plays it back without need for serial connection?
item.content:encoded: How about making it where it stores the pattern in EEPROM and plays it back without need for serial connection?

item.description: You could also charlieplex the rgb leds.
item.content:encoded: You could also charlieplex the rgb leds.

item.title: By: Htoo Naing Win

item.description: your projects are good, but I think it is better to write programs in assembly because I'm not familar with jal very well. Thank you.
item.content:encoded: your projects are good, but I think it is better to write programs in assembly because I’m not familar with jal very well. Thank you.

item.title: By: Matt Bates
item.dc:creator: Matt Bates
item.description:
Would you send me an example of your fantastic idea? SChematic and code of any type would be great! I just happen to have a free copy of BASIC for the pic so that would be nice.
Thnaks for any help,
Matt
item.content:encoded:
